titleStmt.title: [Legal document] 1792 Aug. 25 [to] Bond for Court Appearance of John Shelby & John Scott: a machine readable transcription of an image
titleStmt.author: Shelby, John

For all other use contact the Special Collections Librarian, Hoskins Library, University of Tennessee, 1401 Cumberland Avenue, Knoxville, TN 37996. (865) 974-4480.

bibl.title: 1792 Aug. 25 [to] Bond for Court Appearance of John Shelby & John Scott
bibl.author: Shelby, John
bibl.note: This is a legal document dated August 25, 1792; specifically, it is a bond for the Court appearance of John Shelby and John Scott.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.p: Know all Men by these presents, that we John Shelby & John Scott are held and firmly bound unto John Gosset in the penal sum of One Hundred Pounds, to be void on condition that the said John Shelby doth with effect prosecute a suit, by him this day commenced against the said John Gosset otherwise to pay and satisfy all costs and damages that may be awarded for failure. Witness our hands and this 25th day of Aug. 1792

closer.add: John Shelby vs John Gosset Pm Bonds__
